author: AP
title: Poll: Fans won't feel safe at games without virus vaccine
description: Poll: Fans won't feel safe at games without virus vaccine
content: Some of the findings from the Seton Hall Sports Poll in which 762 U.S. adults reached by phone April 6-8 were asked their thoughts during the coronavirus pandemic that has shut down the nation’s sports calendar. Of the respondents, 54% said they followed spor… [+1609 chars]
